lead_paragraph: Pembry Keller, a daughter of Gail D. Keller and Richard H. Keller of Wilmington, Del., was married Saturday at her parents’ vacation home in Sheldon, S.C., to Pedro Alejandro Sáez, a son of Rosa M. Maza and Pedro P. Sáez of Miami.
snippet: Pembry Keller, a daughter of Gail D. Keller and Richard H. Keller of Wilmington, Del., was married Saturday at her parents’ vacation home in Sheldon, S.C., to Pedro Alejandro Sáez, a son of Rosa M. Maza and Pedro P. Sáez of Miami.
